channel.title: Creating Applet from jar and xml files
channel.description: I have done quite some programming in java, but I have never worked with applets. Now I need for one project recreate one game, witch uses 2 jar files and 2 xml files as archive to operate. So how can I do this in NetBeans?

item.title: Creating Applet from jar and xml files

I have done quite some programming in java, but I have never worked with applets. Now I need for one project recreate one game, witch uses 2 jar files and 2 xml files as archive to operate. So how can I do this in NetBeans?
